CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(agentsync__AgentSync_Status__c, 'not_started'),IMAGE("/resource/agentsync__gray", "", 15, 15), IF(ISPICKVAL(agentsync__AgentSync_Status__c, 'queued'),IMAGE("/resource/agentsync__gray", "", 15, 15), IF(ISPICKVAL(agentsync__AgentSync_Status__c, 'processing'), IMAGE("/resource/agentsync__yellow", "", 15, 15), IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(agentsync__AgentSync_Status__c), 'success'), IMAGE("/resource/agentsync__green", "", 15, 15), IF(ISPICKVAL(agentsync__AgentSync_Status__c, 'nipr_timeout'), IMAGE("/resource/agentsync__red", "", 15, 15), IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(agentsync__AgentSync_Status__c), 'invalid_npn'), IMAGE("/resource/agentsync__red", "", 15, 15), IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(agentsync__AgentSync_Status__c), 'error'), IMAGE("/resource/agentsync__red", "", 15, 15), IMAGE("/resource/agentsync__gray", "", 15, 15))))))))
CustomField.label: NIPR Status
